MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's possessed by the spirit of someone who died here long ago...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's possessed by the spirit of someone who died here long ago...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんで、その校長の右腕が夜、ばぁーって飛び出てくるんだって!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝And at night, the right arm of one of the school's previous principals stretches out!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝And at night, the right arm of one of the school's previous principals stretches out!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ばぁーっとだよ!?　怖いっしょ!?」
`葉留佳@「そんで、その死んだ人ってのが行方不明になった校長でね!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's the corpse of the principal who was thought to have gone missing!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's the corpse of the principal who was thought to have gone missing!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、その校長がなんでそういう風に噂されてるかっていうと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, and it's said that the reason why he does that is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, and it's said that the reason why he does that is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…あれ？」
`葉留佳@「すっごい怖くない、この話？」
`鈴@「全然」
`葉留佳@「えぇえぇーーー!?　うそおっ、こわこわじゃんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ehhhhh!? Yes, it is! Stop kidding me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ehhhhh!? Yes, it is! Stop kidding me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…怖いかもしれないけど、葉留佳さんはまず物を整理してから喋った方がいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er... It could be scary if you told it in a more organized manner...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er... It could be scary if you told it in a more organized manner...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校長の説明する前に校長の右腕が出てたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mentioned the principal's right arm before you talked about the principal himself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mentioned the principal's right arm before you talked about the principal himself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ううっ、ものすごい勢いでダメ出しをされてしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu, you're being very very hard on me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu, you're being very very hard on me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「はるかのおかげで怖くなくなってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm getting less scared thanks to you, Haruka.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm getting less scared thanks to you, Haruka.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁっ、なんか役に立って嬉しいんだか、怖がらせられなくて悔しいんだか解らなくなってきたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, I can't decide between being glad I was helpful, and being frustrated I failed to scare you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwaa, I can't decide between being glad I was helpful, and being frustrated I failed to scare you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、いいことしたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I think you did a good job.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I think you did a good job.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、葉留佳さんのぐだぐだっぷりが初めて役に立った場面だなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: As far as I can remember, this was the first time Haruka-san had ever been useful.
MESSAGE.Translation: As far as I can remember, this was the first time Haruka-san had ever been useful.

MESSAGE.JP: まずは、特別教室棟の１階へ。
MESSAGE.EN: For starters we headed to the first floor of the special classroom wing.
MESSAGE.Translation: For starters we headed to the first floor of the special classroom wing.

MESSAGE.JP: と、そこで恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way there I received an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way there I received an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will reveal the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will reveal the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど…」
理科室かぁ…。
なんか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: 傍らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、ここみたいなんだけど」
鈴は動こうとしない。
`理樹@「僕が行くよ…」
`葉留佳@「頑張ってねーっ、理樹くん」
`理樹@「あー、うん…」
…一瞬葉留佳さんがにやりと笑ったのを、僕は見逃さなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't miss Haruka-san grinning broadly for just a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't miss Haruka-san grinning broadly for just a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアを開けて、理科室の中に侵入。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the door and stepped into the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the door and stepped into the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと…」
`葉留佳@「わぁっ!!」
`葉留佳@「わぁあっ!?」
`葉留佳@「わぁああああーーーーっ!!」
ごろごろっ!!
ずべんっ!!
がたたーんっ!!
ずぼぉーっ!!
葉留佳さんが突然転がりだして、ロッカーの開いたドアに頭をぶつけて、そのままゴミ箱に頭から突っ込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san suddenly rolled down on the floor, hit her head on the open door of a locker, and finally got her head stuck in a trash can.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san suddenly rolled down on the floor, hit her head on the open door of a locker, and finally got her head stuck in a trash can.

MESSAGE.JP: そしてそのまま動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she didn't move at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she didn't move at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…えーと」
なんか、ロッカーから罠と思われるがい骨が顔を出していたが、葉留佳さんのほうがインパクト強すぎてどうでもよかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Meanwhile a skeleton, which must've been set up by Kyousuke, came out of the locker, but we didn't even notice since all of our attention was focused on Haruka-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Meanwhile a skeleton, which must've been set up by Kyousuke, came out of the locker, but we didn't even notice since all of our attention was focused on Haruka-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえずゲットした…」
ロッカーのがい骨に貼り付けられていたお札をとる。
MESSAGE.EN: I removed a note from the skeleton.
MESSAGE.Translation: I removed a note from the skeleton.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁーっ、ゴミ箱、空で良かったぁー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, I survived since the trash can was empty...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, I survived since the trash can was empty...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんがようやく復活。
`葉留佳@「掃除をしっかりやってあるＢ組のひと、エライ！　頑張ってるで賞！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I'm proud of those in class B who cleaned out this lab! They get the cleaning prize!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I'm proud of those in class B who cleaned out this lab! They get the cleaning prize!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「状況がまったくわからないんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really don't get why she ended up doing that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really don't get why she ended up doing that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どこかに向かって喋っている葉留佳さんをおいといて僕は鈴に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving Haruka-san alone, who was babbling into the air, I asked Rin about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving Haruka-san alone, who was babbling into the air, I asked Rin about it.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「葉留佳が後ろからあたしを驚かそうとした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She tried to surprise me from behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She tried to surprise me from behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…あたしが避けたらそのままスっ転んで転がりだした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I dodged her and she tripped over and began rolling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I dodged her and she tripped over and began rolling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでこの有様なわけだね…」
`葉留佳@「うう…今回は私の自業自得だよぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu... I don't have anyone but myself to blame this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu... I don't have anyone but myself to blame this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「…って全然お得じゃないっすヨ！　さっきやった賞、返してもらわなくちゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝...Hey, I got no profit! Give me back the award I gave!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝...Hey, I got no profit! Give me back the award I gave!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変わらず脈絡がないこと言ってるよこの人は。
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world is she talking about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world is she talking about?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹」
`理樹@「何、鈴？」
`鈴@「アホの子がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look, there's a nutty girl over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look, there's a nutty girl over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ずびし、と鈴は葉留佳さんを指差した。
`葉留佳@「…私、アホの子!?」
ずがーん、という書き文字が葉留佳さんの頭上に浮かんだようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be taking it really hard, I could almost see the exclamation marks floating above her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be taking it really hard, I could almost see the exclamation marks floating above her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さて、では行くとするか」
来ヶ谷さんが恭介の用意した懐中電灯を手に取り、先頭に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Having received a flashlight from Kyousuke, Kurugaya-san took the lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having received a flashlight from Kyousuke, Kurugaya-san took the lead.

MESSAGE.JP: さすが、来ヶ谷さんは頼りになる。
MESSAGE.EN: Sure enough, she's one we can really count on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sure enough, she's one we can really count on.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は入り口から動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin wouldn't move from the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin wouldn't move from the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: …やっぱり怖いみたいだった。
`理樹@「うーん、どうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, what are we gonna do about her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, what are we gonna do about her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうするも何も、どうかするのはキミの仕事だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're the one who's supposed to do something about her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're the one who's supposed to do something about her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「とりあえず鈴君の耳元で『怖くない、天井のシミを数えてるあいだに終わるから』と甘くささやけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝For now, go whisper sweetly in her ear: ❛You don't have to be afraid. Just count spots on the ceiling and before you know it it'll all be over.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝For now, go whisper sweetly in her ear: ❛You don't have to be afraid. Just count spots on the ceiling and before you know it it'll all be over.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対蹴られるよっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「まったく…では私が鈴君を抱えていこうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're hopeless... Then I'll carry her in my arms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're hopeless... Then I'll carry her in my arms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほら、パス」
`理樹@「えっ」
懐中電灯を放られる。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed the flashlight to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed the flashlight to me.

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんが鈴を後ろから抱きかかえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kurugaya-san pulled Rin into her bosom from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kurugaya-san pulled Rin into her bosom from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほらほら、おとなしくしろ」
`鈴@「い、いやじゃーっ!!」
その図はなんだか仲のいい姉妹のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They look like real, close siblings.
MESSAGE.Translation: They look like real, close siblings.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「放せ、ぼけーっ」
`来ヶ谷@「おっと」
鈴が来ヶ谷さんの腕を振り解き、そのまま廊下を走っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin wrung herself free and went running away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin wrung herself free and went running away.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、すぐ引き返してきて、元の位置に収まった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, she immediately turned back and returned to her position.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, she immediately turned back and returned to her position.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずそこの方が落ち着くらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like she feels calmer there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like she feels calmer there.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、鈴君は可愛いなぁ」
`鈴@「…可愛くないっ」
頭をなでられるのはものすごく嫌そうだったが、何とか必死に耐えている様子だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was obviously hating being patted on the head, but was struggling to endure it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was obviously hating being patted on the head, but was struggling to endure it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、どうしようか？」
`来ヶ谷@「まあ特別教室棟のほうに行ってみるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let's head to the special classroom area and have a look around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let's head to the special classroom area and have a look around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おっけー」
鈴はすっかりそのポジションに慣れてしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin seemed to have gotten completely attached to that position.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin seemed to have gotten completely attached to that position.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、テレビで見たカンガルーの親子を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They reminded me of a child kangaroo and its mother I saw on TV.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They reminded me of a child kangaroo and its mother I saw on TV.

MESSAGE.JP: と、そこで恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ってことらしいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's what we have to do first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's what we have to do first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「では向かってみるとしよう」
ヒント通りに進み、理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We followed the email's instructions and reached the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We followed the email's instructions and reached the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここらしいんだけど…」
`理樹@「うーん、とりあえず僕が中に入って探してみるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, I'll go in and look for the note.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, I'll go in and look for the note.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
理科室の中に侵入する。
えーと、どこだろ…。
と、教室の中ほどまで進んだとき。
MESSAGE.EN: When I arrived in the middle of the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I arrived in the middle of the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: がたああっ!!
`理樹@「うわぁっ」
ロッカーからがい骨が飛び出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A skeleton came out of a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: A skeleton came out of a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ああ…標本か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, ahh... It's not a real one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, ahh... It's not a real one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「び、びっくりしたよ…」
後ろを振り返る。
`鈴@「うわああああ理樹ーーーっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「ちっ」
来ヶ谷さんが鈴を抱えて逃走を図っていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was trying to run away with Rin in her arms!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was trying to run away with Rin in her arms!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにやってんだあんたぁーっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「うむ…飛び出す青春」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu... just enjoying my youth by dashing out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu... just enjoying my youth by dashing out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「飛び出さないでいいよそんなところっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You don't need to dash out now in the least!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You don't need to dash out now in the least!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は隙を突き、来ヶ谷さんの腕を振りほどくと、一歩間を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin used the chance to break free from Kurugaya-san's arms and took a step back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin used the chance to break free from Kurugaya-san's arms and took a step back.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにするんじゃぼけーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What the heck was that for, stupid!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What the heck was that for, stupid!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふっ」
びしゅっ!!
ばばっ!!
鈴のハイキックをステップで避ける来ヶ谷さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san avoided Rin's high kick by taking a few light steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san avoided Rin's high kick by taking a few light steps.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうした、そんなものか」
`鈴@「うっさい…まだまだこれからだっ」
びしゅびしゅっ!!
次々と繰り出される鈴の蹴り。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin shot out a barrage of kicks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin shot out a barrage of kicks.

MESSAGE.JP: ばばばばっ!!
来ヶ谷さんはさらに速度の上がったステップで対応する。
MESSAGE.EN: Making faster steps, Kurugaya-san avoided them as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Making faster steps, Kurugaya-san avoided them as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふん…」
ばっ!!
ばっ!!
がきぃいいんっ!!
ふたりのハイキックが交差する!!
MESSAGE.EN: Both girls shot a high kick and their legs crossed in the air!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Both girls shot a high kick and their legs crossed in the air!!

MESSAGE.JP: これは…リトルバスターズ最強女子決定戦っ!?
MESSAGE.EN: What is this... the final match of the Little Busters Girls' Championship series!?
MESSAGE.Translation: What is this... the final match of the Little Busters Girls' Championship series!?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「鈴君」
`鈴@「なんじゃぼけーっ」
`来ヶ谷@「後ろに骨」
鈴が来ヶ谷さんの指差すほうに振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin turned around to see where Kurugaya-san was pointing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin turned around to see where Kurugaya-san was pointing.

MESSAGE.JP: …またロッカーから骨が出てきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The skeleton had come out of the locker again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The skeleton had come out of the locker again.

MESSAGE.JP: 声にならない声を上げて鈴が来ヶ谷さんに飛びつく。
MESSAGE.EN: She screamed out wordlessly and hugged Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She screamed out wordlessly and hugged Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、鈴君は可愛いなぁ」
`鈴@「可愛いことあるかーっ！」
強さはともかく、やっぱり来ヶ谷さんのほうが一枚上手みたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Putting aside comparison of their fighting strengths, Kurugaya-san sure is above Rin when it comes to this sort of thing...
MESSAGE.Translation: Putting aside comparison of their fighting strengths, Kurugaya-san sure is above Rin when it comes to this sort of thing...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ちなみにハイキックを正面で受けるたびにぱんつが見えるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I could see your panties every time I received your kicks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝By the way, I could see your panties every time I received your kicks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばっ、とスカートを押さえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin got hold of her skirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin got hold of her skirt.

MESSAGE.JP: …いやまあ。
真っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
MESSAGE.EN: I entered the dark school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I entered the dark school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ…」
足元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
MESSAGE.EN: The inside was so dark I couldn't see anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: The inside was so dark I couldn't see anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
ついてくる二人に声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke up to my partners.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke up to my partners.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの…」
鈴は西園さんの腕を掴んだまま動こうとしない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was holding Nishizono-san's arm and wouldn't make a move.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was holding Nishizono-san's arm and wouldn't make a move.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、大丈夫だから」
`西園@「鈴さん、大丈夫です。わたしがついてます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, there's no problem. I'm with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Rin-san, there's no problem. I'm with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 珍しい強気な発言だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She made an unusually assertive remark.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made an unusually assertive remark.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「たとえ、その階段の向こうから下半身の無い女性が這ってこようと大丈夫です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even if a woman without legs appeared around the corner, there would still be no need to be frightened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even if a woman without legs appeared around the corner, there would still be no need to be frightened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「知ってますか？　轢死体の上半身だけが動き出し駅員を襲う話なのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Did you know? There is a horror story that a woman got killed by a car and only her upper body assaults station employees.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Did you know? There is a horror story that a woman got killed by a car and only her upper body assaults station employees.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何となく思い出してしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I just remembered the story for some reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I just remembered the story for some reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が、ばっと西園さんの手を離し、距離を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin released her hold of Nishizono-san and took a few steps away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin released her hold of Nishizono-san and took a few steps away.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ど、どうされましたか」
`鈴@「…う～っ、ぐるる…」
…敵と見なしたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seems to have identified an enemy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seems to have identified an enemy.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お話をして紛らわそうと思ったのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I thought talking would make us less scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I thought talking would make us less scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、紛らわさなくていいからさ…」
`理樹@「さて、どうしようか」
ふたりとも無言のまま付いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Both girls were following me without a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both girls were following me without a word.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そういえば…」
`鈴@「ふかーっ」
というか、西園さんが何か言おうとするたびに鈴が威嚇をしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: More like, every time Nishizono-san tried to say something, Rin stopped her like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: More like, every time Nishizono-san tried to say something, Rin stopped her like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…すっかり嫌われてしまったようです」
`理樹@「あー、うん…」
鈴相手にあんな話をしたら、そりゃ嫌われるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone would be disliked by her if they told her that sort of story.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone would be disliked by her if they told her that sort of story.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校舎にいるうちはずっと猫モードかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I suppose she's gonna stay in the cat mode until we get out of the building...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I suppose she's gonna stay in the cat mode until we get out of the building...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「猫ですか？」
`理樹@「怖がりすぎるとこうなっちゃうんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She becomes like that when she gets overly scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She becomes like that when she gets overly scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ちっちっちっ」
…口で音を出し、鈴を呼び寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She makes sounds to draw Rin closer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She makes sounds to draw Rin closer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや猫そのものじゃないんだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not that she becomes a real cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not that she becomes a real cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわ、ほんとに近寄ってきてるし…。
`西園@「よしよし」
`鈴@「ごろごろ…」
顎の下をなでてやるとゴロゴロと喉を鳴らす。
MESSAGE.EN: She purred as Nishizono-san rubbed her chin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She purred as Nishizono-san rubbed her chin.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…実は猫の扱いは得意だったりします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...As a matter of fact, I'm good at treating cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...As a matter of fact, I'm good at treating cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ」
`西園@「猫といえばですね…」
`西園@「三味線の皮が猫の物なのは有名な話ですが、かつて町じゅうの猫という猫を捕まえては皮を剥ぎ、その生首を…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's well known that the string of a shamisen is made of the skin of a cat. One time, people captured all the cats in a town and pelted them. After that, the heads...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's well known that the string of a shamisen is made of the skin of a cat. One time, people captured all the cats in a town and pelted them. After that, the heads...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しゃああああぁーーーーーっ!!!」
鈴が敵意剥き出しの雄叫びを上げた!!
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's vehement hiss was raw with hostility!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's vehement hiss was raw with hostility!!!

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「な、なにか気に障ったのでしょうか…」
`理樹@「いや、ほんとに気付いてないんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You really don't understand it, do you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You really don't understand it, do you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうもこの二人には頼れそうもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't think I can rely on these two girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't think I can rely on these two girls.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（こりゃ僕が頑張るしかないか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Guess I'll have to take care of this myself...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Guess I'll have to take care of this myself...)

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず特別教室棟のほうに目星を付けてみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: As the first step, I decided to visit the special classroom wing.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the first step, I decided to visit the special classroom wing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さて…」
後ろをみる。
…ふたりは何とかついてきてくれてるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The two girls were trailing after me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The two girls were trailing after me.

MESSAGE.JP: と、そこで恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 傍らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここらしいんだけど…」
`鈴@「しゃーっ」
`西園@「ふーっ」
牽制し合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: They were hissing at each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were hissing at each other.

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか、何で西園さんまで…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, why is even Nishizono-san doing that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, why is even Nishizono-san doing that...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「正しい猫とのコミュニケーションです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This is a proper way of communicating with cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This is a proper way of communicating with cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ…」
本人は大真面目だ。
`理樹@「まあ、僕が行くしかないね…」
とりあえず、中に入る。
えーと、どこだろ…。
と、教室の中ほどまで進んだとき。
MESSAGE.EN: When I reached the center of the lab...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I reached the center of the lab...

MESSAGE.JP: がたああっ!!
`理樹@「うわぁっ」
ロッカーからがい骨が飛び出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A skeleton flew out of a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: A skeleton flew out of a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ああ…標本か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A, ah... It's not a real one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A, ah... It's not a real one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「び、びっくりしたよ…」
これにはきっとふたりともびっくりしてるに違いない…。
MESSAGE.EN: The girls must also have gotten a scare...
MESSAGE.Translation: The girls must also have gotten a scare...

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろをみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around to see them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around to see them.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ちーかまは好きですか、そうですか」
`鈴@「もぐもぐ…」
まったくノータッチだった！
`理樹@「なんか…苦労してるの僕ひとりだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey... I'm the only one doing this seriously, ain't I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey... I'm the only one doing this seriously, ain't I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずがい骨の後頭部にあった札を取り、理科室を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a note off from the back of the skeleton's skull, and we left the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a note off from the back of the skeleton's skull, and we left the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「よっし、そいじゃ行きますかっ」
`クド@「は、はいっ」
葉留佳さんが恭介に渡された懐中電灯を手に、先に進む。
MESSAGE.EN: Haruka-san turned on the flashlight and started walking at the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Haruka-san turned on the flashlight and started walking at the head.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「く、暗いですねぇ…」
`葉留佳@「足元気をつけなよ、クド公」
`クド@「はいっ」
あ、なんか割と上手くいきそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is going to be all right, I think...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is going to be all right, I think...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さて、どうしようか」
`葉留佳@「んー、どっか目星付いてたりしない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hmm, are there any landmarks or something to look for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hmm, are there any landmarks or something to look for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだねぇ…恭介なら、特別教室棟のほうが怪しいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... knowing Kyousuke's personality, I'd suspect the special classroom wing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... knowing Kyousuke's personality, I'd suspect the special classroom wing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっちの方がいろいろ仕掛け作れそうだしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that place is easy to set up traps in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that place is easy to set up traps in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「おっけー、じゃあそっち行ってみますヨ」
`葉留佳@「クド公もいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Are you up for it as well, Little Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Are you up for it as well, Little Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「おぅけーですっ」
というわけで、ひとまず特別教室棟へ向かうことになった。
MESSAGE.EN: We decided to go to the special classes area first.
MESSAGE.Translation: We decided to go to the special classes area first.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「明かりのない学校ってホントに怖いですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Walking in a dark school building really is pretty scary...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Walking in a dark school building really is pretty scary...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか特別怖いよね、夜の学校って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There really is something unusually scary to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There really is something unusually scary to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さんはすごいです。私だったら先頭なんて怖くて歩けません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You are such a brave girl, Saigusa-san. I can't act like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You are such a brave girl, Saigusa-san. I can't act like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「三枝さん？」
`葉留佳@「ばあ」
`クド@「ぎいやああぁぁあーーーー!?」
…葉留佳さんが懐中電灯を顔の下から当てて振り返った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Haruka-san was shining the flashlight on her own face from below.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Haruka-san was shining the flashlight on her own face from below.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、そんな古典なネタは仕込まなくていいから」
`クド@「古典なんですかっ!!　とても新鮮でビビりまっくすでしたっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Are you sure it's a corny one!? It was really fresh and max frightening for me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Are you sure it's a corny one!? It was really fresh and max frightening for me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「まっくすとかつけてちょっと外国っぽくないですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Adding the word max makes me sounds a little like a native English speaker?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Adding the word max makes me sounds a little like a native English speaker?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あんまりぽくはないなぁ…」
`葉留佳@「クド公もばぁ～」
今度は同じようにクドの顔を懐中電灯で照らした。
MESSAGE.EN: She shined the flashlight on Kud's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shined the flashlight on Kud's face.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うおー怖いねー」
`クド@「私も怖いですか？」
`葉留佳@「うん、こわいこわい」
`葉留佳@「最初にこれ考えたやつすごいよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I admire the one who invented this trick.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I admire the one who invented this trick.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあねえ…」
`葉留佳@「よし、じゃあ懐中電灯ネタはこれくらいにして…」
`葉留佳@「あ」
ごとん、と音がして、明かりが消えてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: We heard something fall to the floor, and then the light disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: We heard something fall to the floor, and then the light disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わあっ！　真っ暗闇になりましたっ!?」
`理樹@「………葉留佳さん」
`葉留佳@「あ、はい、何でございまショ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, yes, how can I help you guys?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, yes, how can I help you guys?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「落とした？」
`葉留佳@「い、いやー、つるっと滑って」
`葉留佳@「あはははどうしよ、もう点かなくなっちゃった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, oh my god. It doesn't work anymore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, oh my god. It doesn't work anymore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どどどどうするんですかっ!!　真っ暗闇はさすがにすぺしゃる怖くて失神寸前ですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wha, wha, wha, what are we gonna do now!! It's too supesharu dark, I'm just about to faint!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wha, wha, wha, what are we gonna do now!! It's too supesharu dark, I'm just about to faint!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、それ面白そうだからこのまま行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, that would be fun. Let's go on ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, that would be fun. Let's go on ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ！　とんでもない地獄の直進行になってしまいましたーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!? Are we going to be marching straight into hell!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!? Are we going to be marching straight into hell!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、理科室へ。
MESSAGE.EN: We headed to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We headed to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「たしか授業の時に、懐中電灯みたいなの使ったよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We used something like a flashlight in a lesson before, I believe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We used something like a flashlight in a lesson before, I believe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 電流の実験かなんかだったと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: If I recall properly we were doing some experiment on electric current at that time.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I recall properly we were doing some experiment on electric current at that time.

MESSAGE.JP: …探してみるが、暗くてよく棚が見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I was struggling to find them, but the darkness was making it hard to search the shelves.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I was struggling to find them, but the darkness was making it hard to search the shelves.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキ、ロウソクとマッチを見つけました！」
`理樹@「あ、じゃあとりあえず明かり代わりにしようか」
`クド@「いえすあいどぅー」
ロウソクに火をつけて、再び棚を探る。
MESSAGE.EN: I lit a candle and resumed looking through the shelves.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lit a candle and resumed looking through the shelves.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと…」
`葉留佳@「ふーっ」
しゅぼっ。
火が消えた!!
`クド@「わあっ、また真っ暗ですっ!?」
`理樹@「いや…なにやってんのさ葉留佳さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey... What the heck are you doing, Haruka-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey... What the heck are you doing, Haruka-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あ、いや～なんか火がゆらゆらしてるの見てたら、つい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ah, I didn't mean to. I just couldn't resist.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ah, I didn't mean to. I just couldn't resist.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ついじゃなくてさ…」
`葉留佳@「あははは私たんじょーびケーキのロウソクの火消すの大好きだったんだよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahahaha, I used to love putting out the candles on my birthday cakes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahahaha, I used to love putting out the candles on my birthday cakes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: この人がいると上手くいくものも行かなくなりそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Will anything ever work out right with this person along...
MESSAGE.Translation: Will anything ever work out right with this person along...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは私も大好きですっ」
`理樹@「まあ、もういいや…」
`理樹@「あれ、マッチは」
`クド@「あ…もう使わないと思って、どこかに置いてきてしまいました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah... I didn't think we would need them anymore, so I left them somewhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah... I didn't think we would need them anymore, so I left them somewhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「葉留佳さん…」
`葉留佳@「えぇー…私が悪いの？」
`理樹@「他に誰が悪いんだよっ」
`葉留佳@「まーアイテムゲットしておいたからカンベンなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Forgive me. I've got something for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Forgive me. I've got something for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴら、と一枚の札を取り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out a piece of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out a piece of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…いつの間に」
`葉留佳@「まーまー、任しといてくださいヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Don't sweat, just leave everything to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Don't sweat, just leave everything to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ」
`クド@「懐中電灯、直りましたっ」
`葉留佳@「あ、クド公そっちのほうを照らすと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey... Don't shine it in that direction...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey... Don't shine it in that direction...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ロッカーから標本の骨が飛び出してきた!!
MESSAGE.EN: A skeleton sprang out of a locker!!
MESSAGE.Translation: A skeleton sprang out of a locker!!

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わっひゃあああーーーっ!?」
`葉留佳@「まあ、万事オッケーってことで」
`理樹@「いやまあ…」
…進めるんならいいけど、いちいち被害が拡大してから事件が収束するのが…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess it's fine as long as we're making progress, but most of our time seems to go into patching up the damage Haruka-san has caused...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess it's fine as long as we're making progress, but most of our time seems to go into patching up the damage Haruka-san has caused...

MESSAGE.JP: まあでも、葉留佳さんのこのノリがあればあんまり怖くはないか。
MESSAGE.EN: But at least we won't get scared as long as she's acting like this, I suppose.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at least we won't get scared as long as she's acting like this, I suppose.

MESSAGE.JP: 真っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
`理樹@「うわあ…」
足元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so dark I couldn't see anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so dark I couldn't see anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
後ろについてくる二人に声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke up to my partners behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke up to my partners behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いきなりいないしっ!?」
なんか初っ端から波乱含みの予感が…。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but worry about the fate of this short trip...
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but worry about the fate of this short trip...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとして、クドの首根っこをつかんだ来ヶ谷さんが戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: A few minutes later, Kurugaya-san showed up with her arm locked around Kud's neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few minutes later, Kurugaya-san showed up with her arm locked around Kud's neck.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、逃亡を図ろうとしていたので、おねーさんが捕まえておいた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, she tried to get away but Onee-san caught her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, she tried to get away but Onee-san caught her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「く、暗いの怖いです…ダメなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, I hate darkness... I can't stand it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I hate darkness... I can't stand it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ、そうだろうけど」
`来ヶ谷@「よし、罰としてクドリャフカ君が先頭だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, as punishment, you'll lead us, Kudryavka-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, as punishment, you'll lead us, Kudryavka-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ」
`理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、鬼だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you are being very hard on her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, you are being very hard on her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なに、毒を食らわば皿までだ。かえって免疫がつく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Might as well be hanged for a sheep as a lamb. This is going to make her mentally stronger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Might as well be hanged for a sheep as a lamb. This is going to make her mentally stronger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「初めから食べないことが大切だと思います…予防が肝心です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I believe it's more important to keep the lamb from getting killed in the first place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I believe it's more important to keep the lamb from getting killed in the first place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、手は取っておいてやるから、先を歩いてみることだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I promise I'll hold your hand, so try to lead us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I promise I'll hold your hand, so try to lead us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はうぅぅ～…」
ひとまずクドに懐中電灯を手渡し、先に進むことに。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed Kud the flashlight and we started moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed Kud the flashlight and we started moving.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「で、ではこっちに行ってみましょう…」
`来ヶ谷@「了解だ」
…何とか先導して先に進んでくれるクド。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kud was somehow managing to lead us on.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kud was somehow managing to lead us on.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「つ、次は…えーと、こっちで…」
`クド@「今度はこっち…」
`クド@「そしてそのままごー・すとれーとです」
`来ヶ谷@「待て能美女史」
`来ヶ谷@「…そっちはどう見ても、私たちが入ってきた入り口の方だが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...No matter how you look at it, we sure are heading back to where we came in from.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...No matter how you look at it, we sure are heading back to where we came in from.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「もうこのまま女子寮帰りたいのです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I want to go back to the girls' dorm～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I want to go back to the girls' dorm～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だそうだが、どうする少年」
`理樹@「うーん…」
`理樹@「でもさ、恭介だったら簡単に逃げられるようにはしないと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't believe Kyousuke would allow us to get away so easily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't believe Kyousuke would allow us to get away so easily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やるといったら徹底的にやるからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Once he decides on something, he does it thoroughly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Once he decides on something, he does it thoroughly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほう、というと？」
`理樹@「例えばさ」
`クド@「こそこそ…」
話し込んでいるうちに、クドが出入り口のほうに。
MESSAGE.EN: While we two were absorbed in talking, Kud was creeping toward the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: While we two were absorbed in talking, Kud was creeping toward the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「脱出なのですっ」
瞬間。
かあんっ!!
`クド@「わふーっ!?」
…天井からバケツが振ってきて、見事にクドの頭にかぶさった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A bucket dropped down from the ceiling, splendidly covering Kud's entire head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A bucket dropped down from the ceiling, splendidly covering Kud's entire head.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ま、前が見えませんーっ!?」
ふらふらと歩く。
がたんっ!!
じゃらららららららーーーっ!!
すかかかかかかかかあんっ!!
`クド@「わあぁぁーーっ!?」
…さらに天井から$K81パチンコ玉$K0が大量に落ちてきて、バケツを豪快に連打した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In addition, a load of $K81pachinko balls$K0 rained down from the ceiling and hit the top of the bucket.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In addition, a load of $K81pachinko balls$K0 rained down from the ceiling and hit the top of the bucket.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…こんなのとかさ」
`来ヶ谷@「なるほど。恐ろしいな…」
`クド@「…きゅう」
目を回して倒れこむ。
MESSAGE.EN: Her eyes spun around and she fell down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her eyes spun around and she fell down.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあとりあえず、クドリャフカ君が全く戦力にならないことが分かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝At least, as result we've learned that Kudryavka-kun's completely useless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝At least, as result we've learned that Kudryavka-kun's completely useless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はうぁ…ごめんなさいです…」
`理樹@「いやまあ、苦手ならしょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's okay, I understand you'd hate doing this sort of thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's okay, I understand you'd hate doing this sort of thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「仕方ないな…そこまで嫌なら、さっさと終わらせることにするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It can't be helped... Let's get this done as quick as possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It can't be helped... Let's get this done as quick as possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理樹君は能美女史の手でも引いて、後からついてきてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun, take her hand and just follow me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Riki-kun, take her hand and just follow me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え」
`クド@「お、お願いしますっ」
…右手を掴まれる。
`来ヶ谷@「『ふたりっきりだったらよかったのになぁ、チッ…』と考えているな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You are thinking ❛Damn, if only it were just the two of us here,❜ right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You are thinking ❛Damn, if only it were just the two of us here,❜ right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「考えてないからっ!!」
`来ヶ谷@「はっはっは」
来ヶ谷さんは笑いながら僕らに背を向け、歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around laughing and started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around laughing and started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「行きましょうっ」
…確かに、こうしてれば少しは怖くないかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I think Kurugaya-san's proposal is working, since I'm less scared than before.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I think Kurugaya-san's proposal is working, since I'm less scared than before.

MESSAGE.JP: クドをみる。
`理樹@「いや…」
ていうか、怖いって思う以前に、気恥ずかしいって気持ちのほうが勝ってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: More like, what occupies my mind now is not fear but embarrassment.
MESSAGE.Translation: More like, what occupies my mind now is not fear but embarrassment.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、ゲット」
`理樹@「はやっ!?」
`来ヶ谷@「なに、おねーさんに任せておけ」
`クド@「すごいです～」
やっぱりなんと言うか、来ヶ谷さんは基本スペックが違う…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how else to say it, but Kurugaya-san's specs are just completely different...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how else to say it, but Kurugaya-san's specs are just completely different...

MESSAGE.JP: 真っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped into the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped into the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ…」
足元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so dark inside I couldn't see anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so dark inside I couldn't see anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
ついてくる二人に声をかける。
`西園@「は、はい…」
おっかなびっくりという感じだが、何とかついてきてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She sure looks frightened, though she's following me somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sure looks frightened, though she's following me somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「く、暗いですねぇ…」
西園さんが頑張ってくれているおかげか、クドも大丈夫そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks to Nishizono-san, Kud is holding together too.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks to Nishizono-san, Kud is holding together too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まずは特別教室棟かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First, let's get to the special classroom wing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First, let's get to the special classroom wing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …横顔をじっと見られる。
`理樹@「な、なに？」
`西園@「…怖くないですか？」
`理樹@「いやまあ、そりゃひとりで歩き回れって言われたら無理だけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, well, I don't think I could walk around here alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, well, I don't think I could walk around here alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「リキはすごいですねぇ～」
`理樹@「みんなに頼りきりだけどねえ」
`理樹@「逃げ出したりしたら、それこそなんか妙な罰ゲームとかありそうだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I suspect there would be some kind of punishment game if I tried to get away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I suspect there would be some kind of punishment game if I tried to get away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ば、ばつゲームですか？」
`理樹@「多分そういうの考えてあると思うよ、恭介は」
`クド@「ど、どんな内容なんでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wha, what kind of punishment do you think it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wha, what kind of punishment do you think it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それはきっと…」
`西園@「てご…」
`西園@「…頑張りましょう」
`クド@「て、てご!?　てごってなんですかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Te, tego!? What on earth do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Te, tego!? What on earth do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どどどどどんなばつゲームなんですかぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wha, wha, wha, wha, what kind of punishment is it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wha, wha, wha, wha, what kind of punishment is it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…頑張りましょう」
`クド@「わふーっ!!　なんだか見事にするーされてしまいましたっ!?」
`理樹@「いや、多分西園さんの想像してるみたいなもんじゃないと思うけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think it's anything like what she's imagining...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think it's anything like what she's imagining...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もっとすごいですか」
`理樹@「いや、なにがどこまですごいかもわからないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not sure what and how terrible it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not sure what and how terrible it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「てごってなんですかーっ!?」
`西園@「…頑張りましょう」
思ってたのより、数倍は騒がしいパーティみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: My party was several times more animated than I would've thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: My party was several times more animated than I would've thought...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さて…」
後ろをみる。
…ふたりは何とかついてきてくれてるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The two girls were trailing after me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The two girls were trailing after me.

MESSAGE.JP: と、そこで恭介からメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just then, I got an email from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 『一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: 傍らにある理科室のドアの前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived at the door to the science lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived at the door to the science lab.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここらしいんだけど…」
`クド@「はい、それでてごってなんですか？」
`西園@「暗いですね…」
`クド@「暗いです…そしてそれよりもてごが気になります…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, it is... More than that, I am curious what tego is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, it is... More than that, I am curious what tego is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、僕が行ってくるよ」
`クド@「がんばってくださいっ、そしててごの謎を解き明かしてくれるとうれしいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good luck. And if you don't mind I'd like you to find out the answer to my current question as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good luck. And if you don't mind I'd like you to find out the answer to my current question as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…能美さん」
西園さんがクドにちょいちょいと手招きをする。
`クド@「あ、はい」
寄ってきたクドの耳に顔を近づけると。
MESSAGE.EN: She then whispered something in Kud's ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then whispered something in Kud's ear.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うわああぁぁぁーん聞かなければよかったですぅーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uwahhhhhn, I would've been happier not knowing!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uwahhhhhn, I would've been happier not knowing!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとまってよく聞こえなかったんだけど何言ったのさ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait a minute. I couldn't hear what you said. What did you tell her!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait a minute. I couldn't hear what you said. What did you tell her!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…殿方に言うのはちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I don't want to tell it to a gentleman...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I don't want to tell it to a gentleman...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!!　ご婦人にも言うのを止めた方がいい内容でしたっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!! You shouldn't tell it to ladies, either!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuuu!! You shouldn't tell it to ladies, either!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、え、待ってよなにそれっ、すっごい気になるじゃんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, eh, come on. I'm getting more curious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, eh, come on. I'm getting more curious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…がんばってください」
`クド@「リキ、がんばってくださいっ」
…いやまあ…。
とりあえず、アイテムをゲットして２階へ。
MESSAGE.EN: After getting the item, we went up to the second floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: After getting the item, we went up to the second floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、何言ったのさ西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what did you tell her, Nishizono-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what did you tell her, Nishizono-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「能美さん、ちーかまはいかがですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, how would you like some cheese fish sausage?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san, how would you like some cheese fish sausage?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい、ありがとうございます」
`西園@「直枝さんもどうぞ」
`理樹@「あ、うん…貰っとく」
…聞けそうにもなかった。
真っ暗な校舎内に侵入する。
MESSAGE.EN: I got into the dark school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got into the dark school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあ…」
足元が心許ないほどの暗闇。
MESSAGE.EN: It was so dark there I couldn't see anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was so dark there I couldn't see anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介から受け取った懐中電灯のスイッチを入れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on the flashlight Kyousuke had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、行こうか」
ついてくる二人に声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke up to my partners behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke up to my partners behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あいよっ、頑張っていこーっ」
…なんか、対照的な二人だ。
`理樹@「さて、まずどこ行こうか…」
`西園@「あ、はい…なんでしょう」
`理樹@「あ、うん…大丈夫だよ」
`西園@「はい、大丈夫ですか」
…西園さんはどうやらついてくるだけで手いっぱいの様だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like she had her hands full just following us.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like she had her hands full just following us.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん？　どしたの？」
…葉留佳さんはなんか余裕たっぷりだし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...On the other hand, she doesn't seem to have a problem.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...On the other hand, she doesn't seem to have a problem.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーとさ、やっぱ葉留佳さんがリーダーやってくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, can I ask you to lead us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, can I ask you to lead us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一番平気そうだしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you are the most appropriate person to do that in our group.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you are the most appropriate person to do that in our group.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、まあここは一つ理樹くんの顔を立ててってことで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm, I want to let you save face, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm, I want to let you save face, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや別に立てる顔もないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have no face to be saved either way, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have no face to be saved either way, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「先頭行ったらつまんないからナァ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Taking the head would be too boring, hence...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Taking the head would be too boring, hence...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ん、なんでもないなんでもないっ」
…なんかまた妙なこと企んでそうだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I wonder what strange plans she's cooking...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I wonder what strange plans she's cooking...

MESSAGE.JP: 当てもなく廊下を進んでいると、携帯にメールが。
MESSAGE.EN: As we were walking down the hallway aimlessly, my cellphone received an email.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we were walking down the hallway aimlessly, my cellphone received an email.

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介からみたいだ。
『一個目は理科室。後は札にヒントが書いてある』
MESSAGE.EN: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [First target is the science lab. A note there will tell the next destination.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なるほど…」
理科室かぁ…。
なんか、怪しげな場所の定番だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...
MESSAGE.Translation: That sure is a stereotypically creepy place for him to think of...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず理科室に行くみたいだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We are supposed to go to the science lab.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We are supposed to go to the science lab.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは相変わらず。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san hasn't changed ever since the beginning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san hasn't changed ever since the beginning.

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんは…。
`葉留佳@「え、なにー？」
なんか唐突に水道場で手を洗ってたみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why, but she's washing her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why, but she's washing her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だから理科室だってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I said we have to go to the science lab.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I said we have to go to the science lab.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うん、わかったー」
…動かない。
`理樹@「いや、だから葉留佳さん先に行ってほしいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, we want to go after you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, we want to go after you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「もー情けないナァ。そんなんじゃ夜の古びた洋館に女の子連れ込んだとき、どうするんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Come on, get it together. What if you suddenly get the urge to take a girl to an old mansion at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Come on, get it together. What if you suddenly get the urge to take a girl to an old mansion at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや絶対そんなことしない自信があるんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I swear I will absolutely not do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I swear I will absolutely not do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…理科室、行きましょうか」
`理樹@「え？　あ、うん」
…意外と平気なんだろうか。
理科室に到着。
MESSAGE.EN: We arrived in front of the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: We arrived in front of the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: …外からの薄明かりは多少あるものの、懐中電灯がないと探索は出来なさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A little light is seeping in through the windows, though I don't think we can search inside without flashlights.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A little light is seeping in through the windows, though I don't think we can search inside without flashlights.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ、僕が行ってくる」
`葉留佳@「あいよっ」
`西園@「…頑張ってください」
`葉留佳@「…にやりっ」
`理樹@「いや、葉留佳さん？」
`葉留佳@「ん？　なんでもないよ理樹くん頑張ってほらほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hm? It's nothing. Riki-kun, good luck, just go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hm? It's nothing. Riki-kun, good luck, just go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（絶対なんか企んでるな…）
わかりやすい人だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She sure is easy to read...
MESSAGE.Translation: She sure is easy to read...

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、とりあえず中へ。
`葉留佳@「うわぁーなんか怨霊っぽいのが美魚ちゃんの肩にぃーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwahhh, a ghost or something is touching Mio-chan's shoulder!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwahhh, a ghost or something is touching Mio-chan's shoulder!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唐突に叫ぶ。
…西園さん、無反応。
`葉留佳@「あ、あれ？」
`西園@「…これはさっきの水道場で濡らしてきたティッシュですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Is this the piece of tissue you watered a few minutes ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Is this the piece of tissue you watered a few minutes ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが首筋に張り付いた濡れティッシュを手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She picked up the wet tissue from her neck.
MESSAGE.Translation: She picked up the wet tissue from her neck.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁっ、もろばれじゃんっ」
`理樹@「いやあの状況で、何にも気づかれてないって思える葉留佳さんのほうがすごいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If anything, I'd like to know how you could be so confident that we wouldn't notice it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If anything, I'd like to know how you could be so confident that we wouldn't notice it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…三枝さん」
`葉留佳@「あ、はい」
`西園@「前々から思っていたのですが…」
`西園@「あなたの行動は往々にして甘すぎるのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You are too spoiled in everything you do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You are too spoiled in everything you do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あまあまです」
`西園@「あまあまハニービーです」
`葉留佳@「ううっ、なんか知らんがこの私をモアスウィートなミツバチ呼ばわりするとはっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu, why do I have to be called something like that, it makes me think of sweet things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu, why do I have to be called something like that, it makes me think of sweet things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「今回も仕込むならバレないようにするべきでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This time for instance, you weren't supposed to let us see your preparations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This time for instance, you weren't supposed to let us see your preparations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…来ヶ谷さんを見習いなさい」
`西園@「そもそも、あなたの『姉御』という呼称が、まずあまあまなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In the first place, your calling her Anego is very spoiled of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In the first place, your calling her Anego is very spoiled of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うぬうっ」
`西園@「本来ならばこう呼ぶべきなのです」
`西園@「…お姉さま、と」
`葉留佳@「お、お姉さまかぁっ」
`葉留佳@「ていうか…みおちんなんかミョーなとこにこだわりますネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Say... I don't understand why you're so particular on these things, Mio-chin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Say... I don't understand why you're so particular on these things, Mio-chin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…カップリングにこだわるのは基本ですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You really have to pay attention to the coupling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You really have to pay attention to the coupling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「なるほど、そうなのかぁ…」
`理樹@「あのー、なんか知んないけど僕聞いてていいのかなこれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... is it really okay for me to listen to this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... is it really okay for me to listen to this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、二人で盛り上がってると思ったら、やっぱり僕のこと忘れられてたんだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, as I suspected, you guys have completely forgotten about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, as I suspected, you guys have completely forgotten about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「いえいえそんなことはないですヨ」
`葉留佳@「おおっとここで怨霊からのぬめり爆弾だぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ohh, a ghost is throwing a slime bomb at you!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ohh, a ghost is throwing a slime bomb at you!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽーい、と濡れティッシュをこっちに投げてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She threw the wet tissue toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She threw the wet tissue toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 一歩引いて、それを避けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a step aside and avoided it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a step aside and avoided it.

MESSAGE.JP: …べちゃ、と床に落ちる濡れティッシュ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The tissue fell down on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The tissue fell down on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「な、これをかわすとはっ」
`理樹@「いや、普通に避けるから…」
`葉留佳@「うわあっ、大失敗だこのネタっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, this trick didn't work at all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwahh, this trick didn't work at all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…あまあまですね」
`葉留佳@「まあ、さっさと…」
瞬間、葉留佳さんの顔が引きつった。
MESSAGE.EN: Right at that instant, Haruka-san's face cramped.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right at that instant, Haruka-san's face cramped.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかした？」
`葉留佳@「う、う、うし、うしろっ!!!!」
`西園@「…そんなネタに引っかかる人はいませんよ」
`理樹@「うん…もう何やってもネタだってわかるしね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's right... No matter what you do, it won't work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's right... No matter what you do, it won't work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「い、いや、ち、ちがっ!!!」
ぶんぶんと腕を振って、あらぬ方向を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She was shaking her hand widely from side to side and pointing inside the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was shaking her hand widely from side to side and pointing inside the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ってみる。
MESSAGE.EN: We turned to face where she was pointing.
MESSAGE.Translation: We turned to face where she was pointing.

MESSAGE.JP: …なにもない。
`理樹@「ほら、なんもないよ？」
`西園@「そういうネタなら先に何かを仕込んでおくべきでしたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You were supposed to prepare perfectly, if you want to do something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You were supposed to prepare perfectly, if you want to do something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺたん、と尻餅をつく。
…なんか、葉留佳さんの演技にしては過剰な気が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was really starting to be too much for her acting performance.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was really starting to be too much for her acting performance.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…何かあるんですか？」
西園さんもそれに気づいたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san also recognized that Haruka-san wasn't playing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san also recognized that Haruka-san wasn't playing.

MESSAGE.JP: …西園さんが理科室の中に入っていく。
瞬間。
がたーんっ!!
…ロッカーからがい骨が飛び出してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A skeleton rushed out of a locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A skeleton rushed out of a locker.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うわっ」
思わず声を上げる。
…西園さんは動じてないみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, she didn't seem to be surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, she didn't seem to be surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きょ、恭介の仕込んだトラップか…」
`葉留佳@「あ、ああ、そ、そうなんだ…」
`葉留佳@「あ、あははは、いやあー本気でびびっちゃいましたヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝A, ahahahaha, I got really freaked out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝A, ahahahaha, I got really freaked out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、突然だとアレはびっくりするよ…」
…西園さんはまだ動かない。
`理樹@「西園さん、全然動じないね…」
`理樹@「ちょっとすごいや」
`葉留佳@「あー、なんか今日これだけでもう全敗な気がするなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝*Sigh*, I guess this is a total defeat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝*Sigh*, I guess this is a total defeat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さん？」
…ふらり、と体を崩し。
ばたーんっ!!
…失神した。
`理樹@「…いやまあ」
まあ、やっぱりそういう人だよねぇ、西園さんは…。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, she's just like I was expecting her to be...
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, she's just like I was expecting her to be...

MESSAGE.JP: ロッカーからアイテムをゲットして、西園さんの復活を待ってから２階に向かうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After getting a note and waiting for Nishizono-san to wake up we left the lab.
MESSAGE.Translation: After getting a note and waiting for Nishizono-san to wake up we left the lab.

MESSAGE.JP: ２階のポイントは音楽室のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The note told us to go to the music room on the second floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The note told us to go to the music room on the second floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に入ると、不気味なピアノの音が聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As we entered, the eerie sound of a piano could be heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: As we entered, the eerie sound of a piano could be heard.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ、なんかきこえるよっ」
…鈴は僕の後ろに隠れてしまう。
`葉留佳@「うわあっ、何だこの呪われた旋律はぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What the heck is this cursed melody!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What the heck is this cursed melody!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 葉留佳さんの反応は、怖がってるのか楽しんでるのかよくわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I can't tell from her reaction if she's amused or scared...
MESSAGE.Translation: I can't tell from her reaction if she's amused or scared...

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ！　なんだか不気味な音なのですっ!!」
西園さんは無言で僕の腕を掴む。
`理樹@「ら、ラジカセだよ…」
ピアノのフタの裏にあった札をゲットした。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the next note that was attached to the lid of the piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the next note that was attached to the lid of the piano.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ただのラジカセだ」
何事もなかったかのように、来ヶ谷さんが札を取ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san took the next note and returned to us like it was nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san took the next note and returned to us like it was nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あっ」
…猫が廊下を横切っていった。
`鈴@「よしよし」
…猫を解放した。
３階は美術室のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The third destination was the art classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The third destination was the art classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 中に入ると、真っ先に目に入るのは…。
MESSAGE.EN: The first thing that caught our eyes when we opened the door was...
MESSAGE.Translation: The first thing that caught our eyes when we opened the door was...

MESSAGE.JP: デッサン用のブルータスの目が光る…!!
MESSAGE.EN: The eyes of the Brutus bust were shining...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: The eyes of the Brutus bust were shining...!!

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁーーーっ!!」
ばたーんっ!!
`理樹@「うわ、小毬さんっ」
小毬さんが倒れた!!
`理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと鈴逃げないでっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H, hey, don't try to run away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H, hey, don't try to run away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわあぁーっ!!　なんだーこのするどいしせんわぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uwahhh!! He's staring at us so sharply!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uwahhh!! He's staring at us so sharply!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変らず楽しんでるのか怖がってるのかわからない!!
MESSAGE.EN: I'm still not sure if she's enjoying herself or if she's scared!!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm still not sure if she's enjoying herself or if she's scared!!

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わぁあーっ!!」
…クドは一声上げた後、硬直してしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...After making that single yell, she stiffened up like a stone...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...After making that single yell, she stiffened up like a stone...

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしには何も見えません」
ドアの付近で中の様子を見ないようにしているようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to have decided to ignore what her eyes were seeing...
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to have decided to ignore what her eyes were seeing...

MESSAGE.JP: 目に画鋲が付けてあるだけだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's just thumbtacks pushed into its eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's just thumbtacks pushed into its eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「画鋲だ」
この人無敵か…？
MESSAGE.EN: Isn't there anything out there that'd faze her...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Isn't there anything out there that'd faze her...?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「猫さんがいましたっ」
`鈴@「よしよし」
…猫を解放した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin patted the cat on the head and let him out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin patted the cat on the head and let him out.

MESSAGE.JP: ４階は、恭介の教室だった。
MESSAGE.EN: The fourth destination was Kyousuke's classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The fourth destination was Kyousuke's classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分、自分の机に仕込んだんだと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think Kyousuke's done something to his desk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think Kyousuke's done something to his desk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の机を探す。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around for his desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around for his desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これか…」
机のなかを探ると、すぐに札が見つかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I fished another note out of his desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I fished another note out of his desk.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴちゃ…。
ぴちゃ…ぴちゃ…。
天井から赤い液体が垂れてきていた…!!
MESSAGE.EN: Drops of red liquid were dripping onto the desk...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Drops of red liquid were dripping onto the desk...!!

MESSAGE.JP: 見れば、天井には人の手がぶら下がっている…!!
MESSAGE.EN: Looking up, I saw a person's hand hanging from the ceiling...!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking up, I saw a person's hand hanging from the ceiling...!!

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわあぁぁーっ!!」
小毬さん、またしても失神…。
…泣きそうな声を上げるが、必死に耐えているようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin was struggling not to cry out...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin was struggling not to cry out...

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うわぁーっ!!　てっ、手首だぁーっ!!」
`葉留佳@「そういえば昔手首ラーメンって話がありましたよネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Speaking of hands, there used to be a story about hand ramen, years ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Speaking of hands, there used to be a story about hand ramen, years ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり余裕なんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I still can't tell if she's fearless or not...
MESSAGE.Translation: I still can't tell if she's fearless or not...

MESSAGE.JP: ばたーんっ!!
とうとうクドが失神した…。
`西園@「…やはりカップリングはこだわりが大切ですよね…」
現実逃避していた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was pushing the reality away...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was pushing the reality away...

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえずアイテムはゲットしたし、急いでここを出よう…！
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, we've got what we needed, so let's get out of here quickly...!
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, we've got what we needed, so let's get out of here quickly...!

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの手を掴んで、全力ダッシュで出口へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: I took their hands and ran for the exit as fast as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took their hands and ran for the exit as fast as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「手袋とケチャップだ」
来ヶ谷さんは机の上に上がり、手首を下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: She went up on the desk and took the glove down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She went up on the desk and took the glove down.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よく出来てるな…遠目からは本物に見える」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Quite well done, it looks like the real thing from a distance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Quite well done, it looks like the real thing from a distance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、じゃあ後の人のためにセットしなおしておくか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, I'll reset it up for the rest of the people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, I'll reset it up for the rest of the people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ついでにもずくを仕込んで、ぬめぬめした指先が首筋に触れるようにしておこう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And I'll attach seaweed to the glove so it'll feel like slimy fingers are touching their neck...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And I'll attach seaweed to the glove so it'll feel like slimy fingers are touching their neck...❞

MESSAGE.JP: トラップが強化された…。
ひとまず、全部のアイテムをゲットしたので、出口へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: We got all we had been supposed to get, so we headed for the exit.
MESSAGE.Translation: We got all we had been supposed to get, so we headed for the exit.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「待て、最後の猫がっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hold on, the last cat is over there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hold on, the last cat is over there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、わかったっ」
`鈴@「よしよし」
…猫を解放した。
`恭介@「お、早かったな」
`理樹@「まあね…」
`鈴@「…もう二度とやりたくないぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I don't wanna do this ever again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I don't wanna do this ever again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「頑張ったじゃないか。次はひとりでだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well done. You can make it by yourself next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well done. You can make it by yourself next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「絶対いやじゃー！」
`小毬@「はあ…何にもなくてよかったよ～」
`恭介@「なんかあった方が面白かったんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It would have been more interesting if something did happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It would have been more interesting if something did happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえ～ん、絶対や～」
…まあ、小毬さんもなんだかんだで最後までついてきてくれたけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, Komari-san did make it to the finishing line.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, Komari-san did make it to the finishing line.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはははまあらくしょーっスヨらくしょー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, it was too easy, too easy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahahaha, it was too easy, too easy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今度は私プロデュース旧市立病院の廃墟なんてどうですかネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let me propose the next place to hold this event. Don't you think an abandoned hospital would be a better choice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let me propose the next place to hold this event. Don't you think an abandoned hospital would be a better choice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いやまあ、結構ビビってる声も聞こえてきてたんだけどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Quite the nice cries you made though, I could hear them all the way out here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Quite the nice cries you made though, I could hear them all the way out here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「え？　あははは演技っスヨ演技」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Eh? Ahahaha, it was just an acting performance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Eh? Ahahaha, it was just an acting performance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、葉留佳さんの演技でああいうのはできそうもないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I don't really think she's been hiding such a magnificent acting talent.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I don't really think she's been hiding such a magnificent acting talent.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「無事に帰ってこれてよかったです～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm happy we came back here safely～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm happy we came back here safely～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうだ、楽しかったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How was it, did you have fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How was it, did you have fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「楽しいのと怖いのが半分半分でしたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was about fifty-fifty fun and scary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was about fifty-fifty fun and scary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…こんどはもっと明るいときに探検したいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I want to explore it in the daytime once again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I want to explore it in the daytime once again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それじゃキモ試しでもなんでもないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you do that, it's not a test of your courage anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you do that, it's not a test of your courage anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「来ヶ谷は…まあ、訊くまでもないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya... Well, I don't think I need to ask you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya... Well, I don't think I need to ask you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「はっはっは。なかなか愉快な趣向だったよ」
`来ヶ谷@「次回は私も仕掛ける側に回りたいところだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I would like to set up the traps next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I would like to set up the traps next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうだな…次があるなら、俺のキモでも試してもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... If there is a next time, would you test my courage?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah... If there is a next time, would you test my courage?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうなれば容赦はせんぞ、恭介氏」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I won't go easy on you, Mr. Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I won't go easy on you, Mr. Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まー、学ばせてもらうさ」
…このふたりはもう、タッグで仕掛ける側に回ったほうがいいんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Those two seem like they both belong naturally on the trap-setting side.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Those two seem like they both belong naturally on the trap-setting side.

MESSAGE.JP: シャレにならなさそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It's too true to be funny...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's too true to be funny...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうだった、西園」
`西園@「皆さんきちんとお祓いをしてもらったほうがいいかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think everyone should go through a proper purification ceremony.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think everyone should go through a proper purification ceremony.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ…」
`西園@「ふと、そんなことを思っただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's just something I suddenly thought of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's just something I suddenly thought of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では」
…会釈をしてみんなの方へ戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She bowed her head and went back to everyone else.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She bowed her head and went back to everyone else.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「待て…なんか俺まずいことやったのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a sec... Could it be, I've done something really bad...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a sec... Could it be, I've done something really bad...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「し、知らないよ…」
…何か不穏当なものが残った。
`恭介@「んで、無事に猫は全部見つかったと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, you found all the cats, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, you found all the cats, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
`クド@「よかったです～」
`真人@「うぉー、ギリギリじゃねえか…」
真人チームが最後に到着。
後に出発した謙吾チームのほうが早かったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although they had started before Kengo's team, they arrived after them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although they had started before Kengo's team, they arrived after them.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえんとこが成績ビリだぜ」
`真人@「んなこと言ったってよぉ…」
`謙吾@「そういえば、俺たちがおまえらを抜かしたはずなのに、まったく気配がなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Come to think of it, we never noticed when we overtook you guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Come to think of it, we never noticed when we overtook you guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　そりゃあおめえ、校長室のトラップで手間取っちまったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? That's because we got stuck with the trap in the principal's office.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? That's because we got stuck with the trap in the principal's office.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「凝った真似しやがるよなぁ。あれぶっ壊しちまったけど問題ねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That one was elaborate. I broke it down. Is that a problem?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That one was elaborate. I broke it down. Is that a problem?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、は？　じゃねえだろ」
`真人@「閉じ込められて影と言う影から右腕が生えてくるやつだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm talking about the trap in the principal's office where the right arm grew from the shadows and assaulted us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm talking about the trap in the principal's office where the right arm grew from the shadows and assaulted us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あれが一番ビビッたぜ、正直な」
`理樹@「…なに青ざめてるのさ」
`恭介@「そんなとこに何も仕掛けてないんだが…」
`理樹@「……なに、このおふだはじゃあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝......What? So, that paper charm he's holding is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝......What? So, that paper charm he's holding is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「焼いたほうがいいと思いますよ」
`恭介@「あ、ああ…」
深く考えないことにしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided not to think about it...

SELECT.JP: ジュースを買いに行く$d真人と遊ぶ$dさすらう
SELECT.EN: Go and get something to drink$dPlay with Masato$dWander
SELECT.Translation: Go and get something to drink$dPlay with Masato$dWander

SELECT.JP: ジュースを買いに行く$d真人と遊ぶ
SELECT.EN: Go and get something to drink$dPlay with Masato
SELECT.Translation: Go and get something to drink$dPlay with Masato

中庭にいく$d学食にいく
SELECT.EN: Go to the courtyard$dGo to the cafeteria
SELECT.Translation: Go to the courtyard$dGo to the cafeteria

SELECT.JP: 猫を探してみる$d教室に戻る
SELECT.EN: Look for the cat$dGo back to the classroom
SELECT.Translation: Look for the cat$dGo back to the classroom

SELECT.JP: 猫を探してみる$d教室に戻る
SELECT.EN: Look for the cat$dGo back to the classroom
SELECT.Translation: Look for the cat$dGo back to the classroom

SELECT.JP: 何を話しているか聞きにいく$d練習に集中
SELECT.EN: Go see what they're talking about$dConcentrate on practice
SELECT.Translation: Go see what they're talking about$dConcentrate on practice
